S01dvavims_tu:264_1: mahatyā rājarddhyā nānāvādyaṃ ninādayan parijanasahāyaparivṛto vaḍabāsahasrair nāgasahasraiḥ parivṛto yathā śakropacāraiḥ śakraparispardhy evaṃ sa vibhūtyā niṣkrāmati /

S01dvavims_tu:267_1: svecchayā tad bhuvanaṃ tyaktvānyatra dūrabhuvanaṃ yayau /

S01dvavims_tu:276_3: duḥprasahyaduḥkhī kaḥ // sa tam āha // mātur apakārād imaṃ duḥprasahyaduḥkham /

S01dvavims_tu:281_0: atha sa dhātustejanṛpaḥ paralokam itiniścitam iti saṃcintya tasmād dakṣiṇapathād vimukhībhūya svarājyaviṣayam anuprāptaḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:282_0: tadā tasya pitrā rājñā cirakālena na pratyāgatena kālagata iti matvā putrasya nāmnā prāsādaḥ kāritaḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:283_0: atha sa dhātustejo nṛpatir dṛṣṭvā paurajanair acihnatvā kenāpi avicāritaḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:283_4: aho me mātāpitṛbhyāṃ mṛta eva gṛhīta iti niścayaṃ matvā me nāmnā pratimādinā prāsādaḥ kāritaḥ /

S01dvavims_tu:598_7: / bata bho śakra devendra marudgaṇasahāya gośīrṣacandanamayaṃ stambham ādāya gaccheti /
S01dvavims_tu:599_1_0: sahacittotpādāc chakro devendro marudgaṇaparivṛta āgato yatra viśvakarmā catvāraś ca mahārājā anekadevanāgayakṣakumbhāṇḍaparivṛtā
S01dvavims_tu:599_3: tatas tasmin vihāre śakreṇa devendreṇa bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho divyenāhāreṇa śayanāsanena divyagandhamālyavilepanapuṣpadhūpaiḥ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjitaḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:599_4: / atha eṣa śabdo rājagṛhe nagare samantato visṛtaḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:599_5: / gṛddhakūṭe śakro devendro marudgaṇena saha bhagavato vihāram abhisaṃskṛtya sarvadevagaṇair mānitaḥ pūjita iti /
S01dvavims_tu:599_7: / tato bhagavān āvarjitā brāhmaṇā iti viditvā - - sarve kriyākāraṃ bhittvā yena gṛddhakūṭaparvate bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya,
S01dvavims_tu:599_8: ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ // atha te brāhmaṇā bhagavatas tāṃ divyāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannā imāṃ cintām āpede /
S01dvavims_tu:599_9: / nūnaṃ buddho bhagavāṃl loke 'gryo yan nu nāma sendrair devaiḥ pūjyata ity āvarjitamanā punar bhagavataḥ purato niṣaṇṇā abhūvan /
S01dvavims_tu:600_1: tato bhagavan tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān /
S01dvavims_tu:600_2: yāṃ śrutvā ṣaṣṭyā ca brāhmaṇasahasrāṇi viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam /
S01dvavims_tu:600_3: anekaiś ca prāṇiśatasahasrair bhagavati śraddhā prati labdhā /
S01dvavims_tu:600_4: / tato bhikṣavo ye ca manuṣyā devagaṇās tasmin vihāre 'tyarthaṃ prasādam utpāditās te taṃ vihāraṃ tyaktvānyatrābhigamanamano notsahante /
S01dvavims_tu:601_0: tato bhagavāṃs taṃ prāsādam {antardhāpitaṃ} antardhāpya anityatāpratisaṃyuktāṃ tādṛśīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān /
S01dvavims_tu:601_1: / saṃsāra evam anityatā tasmāt saṃsāraḥ śūnyaṃ pañcaskandham eva śūnyaṃ sarvam anityatā /
S01dvavims_tu:601_2: / yāṃ śrutvānekair brāhmaṇair bhagavantaṃm āryasatyadarśanaṃ kṛtam /
S01dvavims_tu:601_3: / anekaiś ca prāṇiśatasahasrair manuṣyaiḥ śrotāpattiphalāny anuprāptāni /
S01dvavims_tu:601_4: kaiś cit sakṛdāgāmiphalāni / kaiś cid anāgāmiphalāni / kaiś cit pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ /
S01dvavims_tu:601_6: kaiścit pratyekabodhau / kaiś cid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S01dvavims_tu:601_7: sarvā ca sā parṣad buddhanimnā dharmaśravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā /
S01dvavims_tu:602_1: tatas te bhikṣavo bhagavate divyapūjādarśanād āvarjitamanaso bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:603_0: tathāgatenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavatpratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni yena tathāgatasyaivaṃvidhā pūjā /
S01dvavims_tu:603_1: / icchatha bhikṣavaḥ śrotum // evaṃ bhadanteti tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye 'ham /
S01dvavims_tu:604_0_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani surendradamano nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
S01dvavims_tu:604_0_1: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S01dvavims_tu:605_0: aśrauṣīd anyatamo rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhnābhiṣiktaḥ surendradamanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho 'smākaṃ vijitam anuprāpta iti /
S01dvavims_tu:605_1_0: / śrutvā ca punar māhatya rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena samanvāgato yena surendradamanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrānta
S01dvavims_tu:605_3: ekānte niṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhnābhiṣiktaṃ surendradamanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho bodhikarakair dharmaiḥ samādāpayati /
S01dvavims_tu:606_0_0: atha sa rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhnābhiṣikta utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthvyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
S01dvavims_tu:606_0_1: yena surendradamanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya surendradamanasamyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat /
S01dvavims_tu:607_0: bhagavān āha // asti te mahārāja vijite kaścid vihāro yatrāgantukā gamikāś ca bhikṣavo vāsaṃ kalpayiṣyantīti /
S01dvavims_tu:607_1: / rājovāca // nāsti bhagavan / kiṃ tarhi tiṣṭhatu bhagavan /
S01dvavims_tu:607_2: ahaṃ vihāraṃ kariṣyāmi yatrāgantukā gamikāś ca bhikṣavo
S01dvavims_tu:607_3: vāsaṃ kalpayiṣyanti // tato rājñā tathāgatasyārthe vihāraḥ kārito 'bhūt /
S01dvavims_tu:607_5: tathā kṛtvā ca bhagavataḥ saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātito 'dhīṣṭaś ca bhagavān mahāprātihāryaṃ prati /
S01dvavims_tu:608_1: tato bhagavatā surendradamanasamyaksaṃbuddhena rājño 'dhyeṣaṇaṃ vidarśitaṃ nānāprātihāryaṃ kṛtaṃ buddhāvataṃsavikrīḍitam /
S01dvavims_tu:608_2: yaddarśanād rājā sāmātyanaigamajanapadaḥ sarve ca nāgarāḥ suprasannāḥ śāsane saṃraktaparāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:608_3: / kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūvāhaṃ saḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:608_5: tasya me karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre 'nantasukham anubhūtam /
S01dvavims_tu:608_6: idānīṃ me tathāgatasya sata iyaṃ śāsanaśobhā /
S01dvavims_tu:dak_19_3_2: sārdhaṃ sarvarturamye ciram abhiramate devaloke sa eva //
S01dvavims_tu:614_1: dattvā gaṇāya guṇine pravarāya śākraṃ prāsādaratnam adhigacchati vaijayantam /
S01dvavims_tu:616_0: mahānuśaṃsā vihāradānasya mahāphalānuśaṃsā / ity evaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam iti //
S01dvavims_tu:619_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantam etad avocat //
S01dvavims_tu:620_0: bhagavān āha // śṛṇv ajita sādhu suṣṭhu manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ stūpasatkārajaṃ puṇyaṃ mahattaram /
S01dvavims_tu:622_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ maitreyaikasmin samaye kapilavastuni mahānagaryāṃ nyagrodhārāme mahatā saṃghena sārdhaṃ viharati sma /
S01dvavims_tu:622_1: tasminn avasare tatra kapilavastuny anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
S01dvavims_tu:622_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramati paricārayati /
S01dvavims_tu:622_4: tasya krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā /
S01dvavims_tu:622_5: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
S01dvavims_tu:622_6: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrāntamānuṣyavarṇaḥ saṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ suvarṇaṃ jāmbūnadaniṣkasadṛśaḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:622_7: suvarṇavarṇayā cānena prabhayā sarvaṃ kapilavastu nagaram avabhāsitam /
S01dvavims_tu:622_8: taddarśanān [Dak:_203] mātāpitarāv anye ca kutūhalābhyāgatāḥ sattvāḥ paraṃ vismayam āgatāś cintayanti ca kuto 'yam īdṛśaḥ sattvaviśeṣa iti /
S01dvavims_tu:622_9: / tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
S01dvavims_tu:622_11: / jñātaya ūcuḥ // yasmād anena jātena suvarṇavarṇayā prabhayā sarvaṃ kapilavastu nagaram avabhāsitam,
S01dvavims_tu:622_12: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya suvarṇābha iti nāma /
S01dvavims_tu:622_14: dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ /
S01dvavims_tu:622_15: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam /
S01dvavims_tu:622_16: sa ca paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:622_17: / yāvad apareṇa samayena rūpamadamatto bahir adhiṣṭhānasya krīḍati /
S01dvavims_tu:622_18: tatas tasyaiva mārgāt saṃbahulāś ca śākyā nyagrodhārāmaṃ gacchanti /
S01dvavims_tu:622_19: tatas tena suvarṇābhena dṛṣṭāḥ pṛṣṭāś ca kva bhavanto gacchantīti /
S01dvavims_tu:622_20: tair uktaṃ nyagrodhārāmaṃ gacchāmo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ draṣṭum iti /
S01dvavims_tu:622_21: suvarṇābhasya [Dak:_204] buddha iti śrutvāśrutapūrvaṃ nāma śrutvā sarvaromakūpāny āhṛṣṭāni paramaṃ ca kutūhalam utpannam /
S01dvavims_tu:622_22: tasyaitad abhavat / yan nv aham api bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrameyam iti /
S01dvavims_tu:622_24_0: tataḥ sa dadarśa suvarṇābhakumāro buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair
S01dvavims_tu:622_24_1: virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam /
S01dvavims_tu:622_25: sahadarśanāc cāsya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
S01dvavims_tu:622_27: sa taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajyābhilāṣī saṃvṛttaḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:622_28: yāvan mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇaṃya bhagavantam idam avocat /
S01dvavims_tu:622_29: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyam upasaṃpadāṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyam ahaṃ bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryam iti /
S01dvavims_tu:622_30: / tato bhagavān gajabhujasadṛśaṃ suvarṇavarṇabāhuṃ prasārya suvarṇābhadārakam idam avocat /
S01dvavims_tu:dak_20.2_0: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaś ca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:dak_20.2_1: sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva sthāne yathā sthito buddhamanorathena //
S01dvavims_tu:623_0: yāvat saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśrur dvādaśavarṣopasaṃpanneryāpathaḥ pātrakaravyagrahasto bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitaḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:623_2_0: tena yujyamānena vyāyacchamānena ghaṭamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatiṃ śatanapatanavikaraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā
S01dvavims_tu:623_3_0: arhan saṃvṛttas tejodhātuvītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto
S01dvavims_tu:623_3_1: bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhas sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:624_1: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:624_2: kāni bhadanta suvarṇābhena puṇyāni kṛtāni yenaivaṃvidhaṃ mahottamaphalaṃ prāptam iti /
S01dvavims_tu:625_0: suvarṇābhenaiva karmāṇi kṛtāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavatpratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
S01dvavims_tu:625_1: suvarṇābhena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati /
S01dvavims_tu:625_2: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhyadhātau
S01dvavims_tu:625_3: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātāv api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca /
S01dvavims_tu:dak_20.3_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
S01dvavims_tu:626_0_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśvī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
S01dvavims_tu:626_0_1: lokavid anuttaraḥ purusadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca mānuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S01dvavims_tu:626_2: yāvad vipaśvī samyaksaṃbuddho buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinivṛtaḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:626_3: tato rājñā bandhumatā bhagavataḥ śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaḥ stūpaś catūratnamayaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena /
S01dvavims_tu:627_1: yāvad anyatamo gṛhapatis tasmin stūpamahe vartamāne nirgataḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:627_2: tena tasmāt stūpāt sauvarṇa ādarśaḥ patito dṛṣṭaḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:627_3: sa tenāvataṃsakaṃ kārayitvā tatra stūpe āropitaḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:627_4: gandhadhūpapuṣpārcanaṃ kṛtvā pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam /
S01dvavims_tu:627_5: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇanāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyāmi /
S01dvavims_tu:628_0: bhagavān āha // kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena gṛhapatir āsīd ayaṃ sa suvarṇābhaḥ /
S01dvavims_tu:628_1: yat tena vipaśvinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya stūpe kārāḥ kṛtās tenāsyaivaṃvidho rūpaviśeṣaḥ saṃvṛtto yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tad ihaiva janmany arhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti /
S01dvavims_tu:629_0_0: bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipāka ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklo vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśras tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava
S01dvavims_tu:629_0_1: ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīya ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam /

S01dvavims_tu:634_1: sa āḍhyo mahādhano mahāparivāro vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇapratispardhī /

S01dvavims_tu:634_4_1: asaṃprāptaś ca divyavarṇaṃ cāsyavapuḥ śūkṣmatvaṅ maheśākhyaḥ prāptocchuddhakāyaś ca /

S01dvavims_tu:636_1: vapuṣmān dāraka aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām /
S01dvavims_tu:636_2: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam /
S01dvavims_tu:636_3: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ sarvalokaiś ca pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca /

S01dvavims_tu:636_8: _210] dharmadeśanā kṛtā / yāṃ śrutvā vapuṣmatā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam /
